item.title: iOS隐藏各种bar
item.description: 隐藏顶部状态栏 [[UIApplication sharedApplication] setStatusBarHidden:YES withAnimation:UIStatusBarAnimationNone]; 隐藏Nav self.navigationController.navigationBar.translucent =YES; [self.navigationController setNavigationBarHidden:YES animated:NO]; 隐藏TabBar 在初始时使用self.hidesBottomBarWhenPushed=YES; self
